title: How to Change the Settings on WhatsApp on iPhone or iPad

steps.title: Open WhatsApp.
steps.content: Open WhatsApp. Look for the green icon containing a white chat bubble and phone receiver on your home screen.

steps.title: Tap Settings.
steps.content: Tap Settings . It’s the gear icon at the bottom-right corner of the screen. This is where you’ll find all of the settings you can change in WhatsApp.

steps.title: Select a category to edit its settings.
steps.content: Select a category to edit its settings. Here are some examples of things you can do in the Settings area of WhatsApp: [1] X Research source To change who can view your status updates, read receipts, last seen, and profile information, tap Account , then select Privacy . [2] X Research source To change the tones you hear when you receive calls and messages, tap Notifications . To change the way your chats appear on the screen, tap Chat Settings . To change the phone number associated with your account, tap Account , then select Change number .
